mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEETING_ROOM ( MEET_NO, EMP_NO, MEET_TITLE, MEET_CONTENT, MEET_PNUM, MEET_START, MEET_END, MEET_STATUS, MEET_APPROVAL ) VALUES( SEQ_MEET_NO.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{meetTitle}, #{meetContent}, #{meetPnum}, #{meetStart}, #{meetEnd}, 'Y', 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT MEET_NO, EMP_NO, MEET_TITLE, MEET_CONTENT, MEET_PNUM, MEET_START, MEET_END, MEET_STATUS, MEET_APPROVAL FROM MEETING_ROOM WHERE EMP_NO=#{empNo} AND MEET_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEET_APPROVAL = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEETING_ROOM WHERE MEET_START = #{meetStart} AND MEET_END = #{meetEnd}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEETING_ROOM WHERE MEET_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT MEET_NO, EMP_NO, MEET_TITLE, MEET_CONTENT, MEET_PNUM, MEET_START, MEET_END, MEET_APPROVAL, DEPT_NAME, EMP_NAME, JOB_NAME FROM MEETING_ROOM JOIN EMPLOYEE USING (EMP_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT USING (DEPT_CODE) JOIN JOB USING(JOB_CODE) WHERE MEET_STATUS = 'Y'
